verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Tell<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to be <S%H5144>careful<s%> with the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> to Me, so as not to <S%H2490>profane<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H559>"Say<s%> to them, 'If <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> <S%H7126>approaches<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts] <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> while he has an <S%H2932>uncleanness,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Me. I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H376>'No<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> of the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> is a <S%H6879>leper<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> who has a <S%H2100>discharge,<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts] <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> he is <S%H2891>clean.<s%> And if one <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> made <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by a <S%H5315>corpse<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3318>has<s%> a <S%H7902>seminal<s%> <S%H2233><s%> <S%H7902>emission,<s%>

<S%H176>or<s%> if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8318>teeming<s%> <S%H8318>things,<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> he is <S%H2930>made<s%> <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H120>any<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> by <S%H834>whom<s%> he is <S%H2930>made<s%> <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> his <S%H2932>uncleanness;<s%>

a <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> any such shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts], <S%H3588>unless<s%> <S%H518><s%> he has <S%H7364>bathed<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> in <S%H4325>water.<s%>
'But when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H935>sets,<s%> he shall be <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts], for it is his <S%H3899>food.<s%>
'He shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> [an animal] <S%H5038>which<s%> <S%H5038>dies<s%> or is <S%H2966>torn<s%> [by beasts], <S%H2930>becoming<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> by it; I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'They shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4931>charge,<s%> so that they may not <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of it, and <S%H4191>die<s%> thereby <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H2490>profane<s%> it; I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> them.

<S%H3808>'No<s%> <S%H2114>layman,<s%> however, is to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gift]; a <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> with the <S%H3548>priest<s%> or a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>man<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gift.]

'But <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7069>buys<s%> a <S%H5315>slave<s%> as [his] <S%H7075>property<s%> with his <S%H3701>money,<s%> that <S%H1931>one<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> of it, and <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3211>who<s%> are <S%H3211>born<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H3899>food.<s%>
'And <S%H3588>if<s%> a priest's <S%H1323>daughter<s%> is <S%H802>married<s%> to a <S%H2114>layman,<s%> she shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the [gifts.]

'But <S%H3588>if<s%> a priest's <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H1961>becomes<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%> or <S%H1644>divorced,<s%> and <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2233>child<s%> and <S%H7725>returns<s%> to her father's <S%H1004>house<s%> as in her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> she shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of her father's <S%H3899>food;<s%> but <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2114>layman<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it.

'But <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gift] <S%H7684>unintentionally,<s%> then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> to it a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> of it and shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gift] to the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>
'And they shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7311>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

and [so] cause them to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H5771>punishment<s%> for <S%H819>guilt<s%> by <S%H398>eating<s%> their <S%H6944>holy<s%> [gifts]; for I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> them.' "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H376>'Any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> or of the <S%H1616>aliens<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7126>presents<s%> his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> whether it is <S%H3605>any<s%> of their <S%H5088>votive<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> of their <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7126>present<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> –
for you to be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> – [it must be] a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> from the <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> or the <S%H5795>goats.<s%>
<S%H3605>'Whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> has a <S%H9249>defect,<s%> you shall not <S%H7126>offer,<s%> for it will not be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> for you.

'And <S%H3588>when<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7126>offers<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H6381>fulfill<s%> a <S%H6381>special<s%> <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> for a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offering,<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> it must be <S%H8549>perfect<s%> to be <S%H7522>accepted;<s%> there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H9249>defect<s%> in it.

'Those [that are] <S%H9394>blind<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7665>fractured<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2782>maimed<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> having a <S%H2990>running<s%> <S%H2990>sore<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1618>eczema<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3217>scabs,<s%> you shall not <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> of them an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'In respect to an <S%H7794>ox<s%> or a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> which has an <S%H8311>overgrown<s%> or <S%H7038>stunted<s%> [member], you may <S%H6213>present<s%> it for a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offering,<s%> but for a <S%H5088>vow<s%> it shall not be <S%H7521>accepted.<s%>

'Also anything [with its testicles] <S%H4600>bruised<s%> or <S%H3807>crushed<s%> or <S%H5423>torn<s%> or <S%H3772>cut,<s%> you shall not <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> or <S%H6213>sacrifice<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%>

<S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H7126>accept<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H428>such<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H1121>foreigner<s%> <S%H5236><s%> for <S%H7126>offering<s%> as the <S%H3899>food<s%> of your <S%H430>God;<s%> for their <S%H9297>corruption<s%> is in them, they have a <S%H9249>defect,<s%> they shall not be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for you.' "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H3775>sheep<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5795>goat<s%> is <S%H3205>born,<s%> it shall <S%H1961>remain<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> with its <S%H517>mother,<s%> and from the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> on it shall be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> as a <S%H7133>sacrifice<s%> of an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"But, [whether] it is an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> you shall not <S%H7819>kill<s%> [both] it and its <S%H1121>young<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> it so that you may be <S%H7522>accepted.<s%>
"It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> on the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> you shall <S%H3498>leave<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of it <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"So you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And you shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> but I will be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> you,
who <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be your <S%H430>God:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "
